entries.abort: Yeah, that's right. You don't have any business with me anyways.
entries.angry_disable: Hey, what did you do that for? We were just out on a simple pleasure cruise. There was no need to get violent.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Location of yacht discovered. Transfering the data to your navigation computer. Proceed as planned.
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <Enemy fighters have been eliminated.>
entries.capture_complete: Yacht captured. Prepare to escort her back to HQ.
entries.capture_phase_1: What are you doing? You have no right to board us!
entries.capture_phase_2: Call this off before it is too late. Your superiors will not be happy when they hear about this.
entries.capture_started: Boarding process underway. Please stand by.
entries.complete: Well done. We have the ship in our possession. Now let us see what the good colonel kept in the ship's systems.
entries.failed_destroy: Pilot, your orders were to recover that ship, not destroy it. Report back to your superior.
entries.failed_escape: Pilot, I thought we had made it clear that you were to capture that ship. Report back to your superior immediately.
entries.panic_1: Rebels incoming! Keep them off of us until we can make the jump.
entries.panic_2: Watch our back. Those Rebels are not going to be happy about the lose of this shuttle.
entries.panic_3: I was wondering when they would show up.
entries.panic_4: Make short work of those Rebels. We have a job to do.
entries.panic_5: They just don't know when to quit, do they?
entries.quest_disable_d: Take the engines of the yacht offline so you can begin the capture process.
entries.quest_escort_d: Return the yacht back to Imperial hands. If it is important as we think it is you can expect to be attacked trying to recover it.
entries.quest_location_d: Travel to the Naboo system and intercept the yacht. Flight command reports that it left the system briefly and then returned. A navigation waypoint will be supplied to you.
entries.quest_recover_d: Once it is disabled, move in close to begin the capture process.
entries.recovery_success: Excellent work, pilot. Stand by until the yacht jumps.
entries.split_quest_alert: We think we have found something very interesting in the yacht's comptures. The shuttle transfered some data to a mercenary craft on it's way to Yavin 4. Proceed immediately to the Yavin sector and inspect that craft's computers.
entries.target_disabled: The yacht is disabled. Take control of it before it can get its engines back online.
entries.taunt_1: You will never take that vessel!
entries.taunt_2: Your the pilot who killed Hend! You are going to pay for that!
entries.taunt_3: To get that shuttle you are going to have to get through me first!
entries.taunt_5: The force is not with you.
entries.thanks_1: Foolish Rebels! They should have just stayed at home.
entries.thanks_3: What a waste! Not the Rebels...I just spilled my drink.
entries.thanks_4: They really need to train their pilots better if they plan on defeating us.
entries.thanks_5: That was the sorriest thing I have seen in a long time. Where did they get those useless pilots?
entries.title: Naboo System: Capture Colonel Hend's Yacht
entries.title_d: Someone has stolen the now deceased Colonel Hend's private yacht. Command thinks that this yacht might have more information regarding Colonel Hend's activities and wants it back so they can investigate. Capture and return the yacht to Imperial hands.
